verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: unleashed] [ARG1: a flurry of tweets] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday and Monday] [C-ARG1: attacking Mexico on several fronts , including immigration and the North America Free Trade Agreement] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] unleashed a flurry of tweets Sunday and Monday [V: attacking] [ARG1: Mexico] [ARG2: on several fronts , including immigration and the North America Free Trade Agreement] .
President Donald Trump unleashed a flurry of tweets Sunday and Monday attacking Mexico on [ARG2: several fronts] , [V: including] [ARG1: immigration and the North America Free Trade Agreement] .
